backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
criticalBackgroundColor.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as critical
criticalTextColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as critical
goodBackgroundColor.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is good
goodTextColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as good
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
maintenanceBackgroundColor.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as maintenance
maintenanceTextColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as maintenance
majorBackgroundColor.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as major
majorTextColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as major
minorBackgroundColor.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as minor
minorTextColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as minor
noneBackgroundColor.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as none
noneTextColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as none
statusURL.comment: The url that provides the current compass mining facility status
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
